name: Orbix the Terrorball
overview: Orbix is the codename for your tactical planetary warfare craft. As supreme commander your mission is to rescue the survivors of a friendly spacescraft which was forced down on the planet Horca. This is a fast moving, fun 'shoot-em-up' with plenty of twists and turns to tax your will and wit. A mixture of strategy and droid blasting, Oribix will keep you busy for several eons of time.
